name: Race Dog Racer Simulator 2016 – Virtual Racing Championship with Real Police Dogs
name_original: Race Dog Racer Simulator 2016 – Virtual Racing Championship with Real Police Dogs
description:
We bring the best Virtual dog racing experience to your Iphones. If you like playing pet dog games, training, cleaning and feed the puppies. Well try this race dog simulator out. Here we have a bought a twist to the police dog games.

You can choose your favorite pet german shepherd and then help him win the race. This racing game I exquisite with its 2 modes:

The Betting mode: Where you choose the favorite number and bet on it. Enjoy the real 3D action the dog racing and hold you breaths till your dog wins.

The racing mode: Here you choose your pet dog and tap tap tap to make him run faster. Your pet dog depends on you to cross the Checkpoint as the winner.

So Download this Race Dog Racer Simulator 2016 and enter the Real 2016 Racing championship World.
